thread.title: Police make first arrest four months after Las Vegas shooting

title: Police make first arrest four months after Las Vegas shooting
text:
Police make first arrest four months after Las Vegas shooting 8:22pm IST - 01:09 
An Arizona man who sold armor-piercing bullets to the Las Vegas shooter was charged on Friday with conspiracy to manufacture and sell such ammunition without a license. Jane Lanhee Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An Arizona man who sold armor-piercing bullets to the Las Vegas shooter was charged on Friday with conspiracy to manufacture and sell such ammunition without a license. Jane Lanhee Lee reports.
